hero.title: SotA Research turns frontier research into State of the Art operating leverage.
hero.description: We map the signals, curate the art, and ship activation-ready releases so teams can deploy what is next — not what was relevant last quarter.

principles.title: Our mission
principles.description: We close the gap between academic research and real implementation across organizations, teams, and communities.
principles.body: We select research with high transformational potential, structure it into understandable journeys, and highlight the concrete steps needed to put it into practice.

principles.title: Expert community
principles.description: We collaborate with researchers, industry specialists, and mentors to validate every line.
principles.body: The platform evolves alongside the community. Every release blends feedback, usage metrics, and outcomes from real teams.

principles.title: Methodology
principles.description: Each release combines current context, implementation guidance, and academic foundations in one place.
bullets: Current landscape: what is happening and why it matters.
Implementation: tactical guides, tools, and real cases.
Academic foundations: theoretical frameworks and references to go deeper.

principles.title: Commitment
principles.description: Transparency, security, and content quality are the pillars of our operation.
principles.body: We invest in robust editorial processes, ongoing audits, and metrics that let us measure the real impact of every release.

how.title: How we work
how.intro: The SotA Research collective blends research, product, and operations expertise. Every SotA release moves through an editorial pipeline that pairs qualitative insights with measurable outcomes.
how.body: Our roadmap is community-built: we surface emerging art, co-design lines with partners, and sustain recurring update cycles so the intelligence never goes stale.

pillars.title: Impact pillars
items: Enable informed strategic decisions across teams.
Shorten adoption timelines for emergent technologies.
Measure outcomes and circulate learnings back to the network.
